title: Found a way to not get support 20 games in a row
body:
So after playing 1000 games of support straight I decided I wanted to play a role other than support so I changed my primary/secondary from Mid/Support to Mid/ADC.
Surprisingly I didn't get stuck in support after that.

replies.body: "how to not get support: don't pick support."
Thanks, Captain Obvious, I didn't know that!
go figure
or fill
Its surprising how many people complain when they don't even think about the fact that they get to chose what role to play.

Until you decide to work on your morgana mid lane and your troll support goes karthus for no apparent reason and you have to become the support since your ADC is trash and needs someone to carry him.

You know, hypothetically of course.
k
Wow Riot must HATE you for this 1 weird trick.
Please select an age 18-65 to qualify for your free quote today!

I only play support so this isn't a complaint, but I have NOT gotten my secondary in the past 50 games at least. Like this one time I actually got mid and I picked a support champ. I realized then I have forgotten how to last hit. It's been so long.
I actually got midlane today and surprised myself. http://i.imgur.com/tqW8BHb.jpg
Hell, I queued up as 3 and we were support/fill, adc/mid, and top/mid and the support/fill got mid lane out of all of us and we didn't know what to do with our lives.
xD

I used to be an adc main so I last when I support as well.  9 times out of 10 I don't get the minion kills because my adc attacks faster but if he misses like most bad adcs do I get the gold.  The benefits of being gold while playing with bronze
I think I messed up. I tries to follow these instructions aND now my dick is stuck in a toaster, pls hlp.
See, the indirect consequences that no one thinks about. There should be a clarification of possible outcomes here.
Lmao
Funnily whenever I am duoing or playing in a 3 man premade and pick Support/Mid I tend to get mid in 80% of the lobbies we get in.
I can confirm having support as your secondary almost 100% guarantee's you'll get support everytime but having it as your primary you only get it like 50% of the time at most.
Isn't that anecdotal? You might have just been unlucky. There's plenty of support primaries who get support most of the time.
It is but it's the same for me tbh

Anecdotal? Yes.
I've had the same experience, personally.

Though I still don't rule out Murphy's law and the law of large numbers.

Yea when I run lobbies with people I run Sup/Fill and somehow get jungle or mid and my buddies get put in support.

A Mid Raka is fine too, though. I won't complain about actually having AP.
just swap with them lol
The full AP banana is the deadliest.
no. the hidden banana is the deadliest....jungle raka works...kinda...er...not really.
Well it *used* to - at least, back when Starcall was a spam ability. >_>
it still does but not into a tanky team.   REALLY HARD FIRST THREE CLEARS.  but almost won a ranked game with it...then enemy team got tanky and focused me
How do you even do your first clear though? IIRC Q doesn't give you the heal nor regen buffs if they don't hit Champions, and E doesn't affect minions & monsters?

first clear = krugs then raptors.  recall. go to red do it. gank mid. recall if you cant gank mid. do blue. do wolves. 

REPEAT. anything else is too strong!
Recalling after your second camp seems mad unreliable... if there's, say, a Shyvana or Nunu against you, say goodbye to your entire jungle lmao
as i said its works kinda XD
That's odd.. I've done this like 15 times and never got mid lol.
That's the power of EU. Fear mi! Kappa
How to not get support 20 times in a row: Only play 19 games

Seriously???
1.4K views?
How the hell did something like this get so much attention, when it's literally been addressed multiple times. 
If you don't want support? don't pick support for primary, or secondary. People still complain about getting stuck support.
Where do you see the amount of views?
before you click the thread

Doesn't work.

Still got into support for some reason.

It's like Riot knows...

Kind of sucks for people who main mid and suck at top adc and jg. I only pick Mid/Support because im good at those posistions, however I am much better at mid Ahri than any other champ in any other position. Ive even started going support ahri, I won 7 games in a row with it, then got trolls in the last 2 games ive played as it.

\>Plays Ahri support
\>Complains about trolls when you lose

Like why not look at times where you coulda carried better instead of blaming it on trolls.

erm dude. In all 9 games I did the most damage on the team, and had the highest KDA. I quite literally carried as support Ahri for all 9 games. Playing non meta champs isn't trolling.  Might as well make that 8 wins and 2 losses now because I just won another.

I'm not saying anything is bad about playing non meta champions. Heck thats what ive been doing lately. Im just saying, take each loss as a loss and see how you can do better at your champion pick instead of blaming it on trolls.

Not much I can do when I go 5/1/11 and have the most damage on my team, and the top graves goes 2/10 in the top lane despite my ganking from bot 2 times. Or when my gragas from that game gets outganked by a deverouer udyr 7ganks to gragas 2 ganks. Or the cassiopeia starts out 0-6 and allows the mid quin to roam. I cant control every aspect of the game simultaneously. or my worst game so far. 4-2-5 was my kda. my jg lee started out 1-7 and tried to towerdive the enemy shen at lvl 3. My top malph ran exhaust and never grouped for teammfights till we were 40 minutes in. my vayne decided to play like an idiot and repeatedly go in on a draven/alistar bot lane in the early lane phase.

Sure they weren't true trolls. But they refused to cooperate when I told them what to do. Its hard micromanaging everyone on your team because you know that if you don't they will end up feeding. That has been every single game I've lost. This game is hard because of the reliance on your teammates. And I'm not ever over occupying myself with what they do. There are some games that aren't winnable, and those 2 unwinnable games just happend to be when I played Ahri support . 

If you said that there was nothing wrong about playing nonmeta champs, then why say anything in the first place?
Refusing to acknowledge that there are shitty players out there that you may get stuck with is just a challenger players attempt to belittle your skill at the game, and indirectly insult you for not doing enough if you lose. 

League is a team game. 80% of it is getting the 4 other players to cooperate with you, and the other 20% is you doing your absolute best to solidify a lead and win the game. You can be 20-0 midlane and still lose because you have a terrible frontline, or the enemy builds against you and your penn items cant melt them fast enough before they melt the rest of your team. 

Now I don't know if you know what gold 2 - plat 4 is like, but you almost need a degree in child pshycology to get past it. It is the dregs of the league community, and home to some of the most uncooperative and egotistical players in the entirety of the league community. Almost every other rank in the game is a representation of skill, however this range of ranks is just a dice roll. I've been from silver 4 to plat 1 and I can tell you, gold 2-plat 4 is just the absolute worst. Games here are especially toxic. It almost feels like you are playing in a bad bronze game. 

Then again, this whole situation can be summed up to gold 2- plat 4 being absolute cancer and a nightmare to play in.
Thanks for the fix, mate.

Support just less stressful imo...I go top lane and if enemy top teleports bot and gets a double i get flamed.. I go mid and if my enemy goes bot and gets a double i get flamed.. I go Jungle and get flamed for not ganking for my team mates when they are obviously pushing too damn much... I go ADC and just get full on flamed because i suck at farming and squish life just aint a life for me
Odd little glitch that I can see being exploited in the future. Riot should fix this next patch. XD
Out of 160 games queing for mid/adc I've gotten mid about 13 or 14 times total. It basically has the same problem as queing for support and something else where you'll always get it

Eh, I also usually use that pair, but get mid probably every 6th game or so depending on how many people I queue with. When I'm by myself I get it more often, but when I play with others it's less since almost everyone I play with is a mid secondary player so we all have to fight for it.

I checked my op.gg and I've gotten mid exactly 16 times in 154 matches. I do actually frequently duo que but my friend typically does jungle/top so I don't really think that has much of an impact... Just that when I played blind pick I used to get mid so much more for that sweet malzahar freelo...
